headline: ExxonMobil Flags Coal Comeback as Threat to Net-Zero Goals
summary: XOM's outlook warns that net-zero targets are slipping as coal use rebounds and oil and gas demand stays strong through 2050.

headline: How—and Why—U.S. Capitalism Is Unlike Any Other
summary: The main difference between America’s brand of capitalism and elsewhere: a focus on the individual and an incentive to take risks.
